term.title: ionic polymerization

item.text: A chain polymerization in which the kinetic-chain carriers are ions or ion pairs.

notes.item: Usually, the growing chain ends are ions.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2308 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
